text: hua bhee yahee ki usaka saara phal ghiraav mein aa gaya. usane usamen jo kuchh laagat lagaee thee, usapar vah apanee hatheliyon ko nachaata rah gaya. aur sthiti yah thee ki baag apanee tattiyon par ha pada tha aur vah kah raha tha, "kya hee achchha hota ki mainne apane rab ke saath kisee ko saajheedaar na banaaya hota
